recipes.title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A fast and healthy chicken stir-fry with vegetables
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper.
2. Heat oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
3. Cook chicken until golden, about 5-6 minutes. Remove and set aside.
4. Add vegetables to the wok and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
5. Return chicken to wok, add soy sauce and ginger.
6. Stir everything together for 2 minutes.
7. Serve hot over rice.
